attach(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Attaches `amount` value of attribute type `attrId` to `tokenId`.

attrURI(uint256).details: Returns the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for `attrId` attribute.

attributesOf(uint256).details: Returns all attribute types of owned by `tokenId`.

balanceOf(uint256,uint256).details: Returns the attribute type `attrId` value owned by `tokenId`.

balanceOfBatch(uint256,uint256[]).details: Returns the batch of attribute type `attrIds` values owned by `tokenId`.

name(uint256).details: Returns the name of the attribute.

primaryAttributeOf(uint256).details: Returns primary attribute type of owned by `tokenId`.

setPrimaryAttribute(uint256,uint256).details: Set primary attribute type of owned by `tokenId`.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[EIP section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

symbol(uint256).details: Returns the symbol of the attribute.
